text: Daniel Nii Ayi Laryea (born 11 September 1987) is a professional Ghanaian football referee. He has been an international referee for FIFA since 2014. He is a referee in the Ghana Premier League. Laryea refereed during the 2020 African Nations Championship hosted by Cameroon which was played in 2021 due to the COVID-19 pandemic. Laryea was born in Accra, Ghana and attended secondary school at Accra Academy. == References == Category:Sportspeople from Accra Category:Living people Category:1987 births Category:Association football referees
title: Daniel Nii Laryea
